page.title: 06Parents' Work
page.content:
My dad works at the Airport for "Laird Hotel" which is a catering unit that puts food on planes. My dad goes to work by car. He is a supervisor so he has to check that the right food is on the planes. He does shift work from 6.00am to 5.00pm or 1.00pm to midnight.
My mum works in Crawley about 7 miles away. She works from 9.00am to 3.00pm and has school holidays off. She works at Building and Civil who work out people's holiday pay.
My dad works at Sun Alliance from 9.00am to 5.00pm - sometimes he works flexitime and he uses computers a lot.
My mum is a physiotherapist at Horsham Hospital. She is blind so she gets a lift to work or walks with Imogen, her
